post.body: Thanks please RT TWIP nominated for Weblog award http://tinyurl.com/9wz579
I have to put on gloves to handle that on its way to the prize bin :) But I sure appreciate the thought :)
That's an EXCELLENT question that nobody's ever asked me. I'd say about 50%. The other 50% makes the prize bin :)
I don't see Apple in the NetBook space - at least not the way people currently think of NetBooks. Maybe next year tho.
Too much stuff to list. See the pics for an idea.
yes he is @alexlindsay - perhaps he has a schedule he can share with you.
THANKS for your support of my work. I can't believe it but we only have nine left to sell! It's the fastest any of my images sold.
I was talking about the Nik Complete collection which is cheaper for Aperture than Photoshop. http://tinyurl.com/5re5rv
I am not sure what Alex plans to do regarding TWIP at Macworld. He hasn't shared that with me. Will be doing MacBreak on Tue. @ 12.
I can't give predictions because if I'm right I'd burn sources. Let's just say that it should be more interesting than most think.
I agree that Apple is far too secretive. I DON'T agree that Jobs had obligation to release his medical cond. given it's not deadly.,
To answer everyone's question at once. I stick by my statement that keynote was good. I didn't expect a Steve Jobs here's the iPhone thing.
Wow what a busy morn. Keynote was better than I expected. MBW went very well. SRO crowd. Nonstop meetings since then. TWIT dinner tonight.
Made it to the speakers' lounge. They're making us get here earlier and earlier every year. They're promising breakfast this year!
Getting ready to go to the Keynote at Macworld. We're gonna record MacBreakWeekly live on the floor right after. More tweets this afternoon.
I'm off to some lunch meetings and product briefings.
Just got my speakers' badge and goodie bag. First photos of Macworld 09. http://www.flickr.com/photos/applephoneshow/sets/72157612153886315/
I'll be heading to the speaker's office today to pick up my badge and other credentials for MacWorld this morning. Will there be a SWAGBAG?
I now have three different reliable sources telling me there will be new hardware announced at Macworld keynote. No details.
By the way I was trying to be cute when I said "dying" but that didn't translate well. I'll probably never be able to be clever in 140 char.
